name: Road Legends
description: Road Legends is a neon retro-futuristic racing game where you will race to music and collect bonuses on a rhythm basis You're on the road, although this time it's not a race where you need to be faster than your rivals! Just relax and drive through futuristic city!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 345 MB available space
